::Spitfire::

She walked inside the ark and walked outside.  She saw Savanna 
resting in a tree.  She desided not to bother the lazy lioness.  So 
she walked around conducting a partol of the grounds aroung the ship.

She saw HotRod aproach.  "What's going on HotRod?" She took a step 
back at his new body armor.
"Whoah, where did you get the new plates?"
